events.message: I received my order last week but would like to request a refund as the item does not meet my expectations and I want to return it.
System has categorized the customer's issue as a Refund based on keywords like 'refund' and 'return' found in the complaint.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle following the initial report from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund. I'll assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so I can expedite your case?
The order number is 7845123. The product arrived but the color was completely different from what was shown on the website.
Thank you for the details. I can initiate a full refund for you and provide a prepaid shipping label so you can return the product at no cost.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I appreciate the prepaid label and quick response to my refund request.
Your refund request has been processed and the shipping label has been emailed to you. Please ship the item back at your earliest convenience.
Checking in to confirm that you received the prepaid label and to ensure the refund process is going smoothly.
Yes, I received the label and sent the product back yesterday. Thank you for the excellent support!
The refund has been completed and your case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and we hope to serve you better next time.
We have sent you a short survey to help us improve our refund process. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
